The Cr(1)-N(1) bond length is 1.90 Å. Both Cr(1)-N(2) bond lengths are 1.93 Å. There are two inequivalent N sites. In the first N site, N(1) is bonded to six equivalent Cr(1) atoms to form corner-sharing NCr6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedral tilt angles are 48°. In the second N site, N(2) is bonded to six equivalent Cr(1) atoms to form a mixture of corner and edge-sharing NCr6 octahedra. The corner-sharing octahedral tilt angles are 48°.
